long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Ultimate Dank Reply Generator for Twitter.

Dank AI is a Chrome extension that injects a "Dank Reply" button into Twitter's web interface. This button, when clicked, generates a humorous and witty reply to tweets using a local AI model. Perfect for adding a touch of humour or to your Twitter interactions, all while ensuring your data remains private and the service is free forever!

***Important Setup Instructions:***
To ensure the extension runs correctly, we will have to do these steps in Chrome Dev or Canary build:
- Download Chrome dev or Canary (currently not supported in main chrome)
- Open a new tab in Chrome and go to chrome://flags/#optimization-guide-on-device-model.
- Enable "BypassPerfRequirement" to bypass performance checks that might hinder Gemini Nano from downloading.
- Go to chrome://flags/#prompt-api-for-gemini-nano.
- Enable "Prompt API".
- Relaunch Chrome dev/canary to apply the changes.
